title: Iker Casillas and Gianluigi Buffon share a hug after legendary Champions League last-16 clash between Porto and Juventus
text:
EFL Stuff of legends Iker Casillas and Gianluigi Buffon share a hug after legendary Champions League last-16 clash between Porto and Juventus 
World's best goalkeepers over past two decades were at either end of the pitch for the clash â€” and the second leg in Turin may be the last time that ever happens Pictured
